DOC.criteria: 1 . Consent : Demonstrates understand study willingness participate evidence subject 's parent legally authorise representative 's voluntary write informed consent receive sign date copy inform consent form . 2 . Compliance : Understands willing , able likely comply study procedure restriction 3 . General Health : Good general mental health , opinion investigator 4 . Child BMI age < +1 standard deviation ( SD ) > 2SD 1 . Children Care ( CiC ) : A child place control protection agency , organisation , institution entity court , government government body , act accordance power confer law regulation . 2 . Allergy/Intolerance : Known suspected intolerance hypersensitivity study material ( lactose , wheat gluten , soy protein ) state ingredient . 3 . Child severe anaemia ( Haemoglobin < 7 g/dl ) determine non invasive spectrophotometry result . 4 . Participation another clinical study receipt investigational drug within 30 day screen visit . 5 . Participation nutritional study didactic nutrition education last 6 month screen visit 5 . Current relevant history serious , severe unstable physical psychiatric illness medical disorder would make subject unlikely fully complete study condition present undue risk study product procedures opinion investigator . 6 . Recent history ( 3 month ) serious infection , injury and/ surgery . 7 . Children consume iron , calcium and/or nutritional supplement and/ health food drink regular basis ( 3 time week , recommend dosage ) last 1 month prior screen visit . 8 . Use prescription medication study period equal two week .
